text: Ayawaddu 'Ahadukum 'An Takuna Lahu Jannatun Min Nakhilin Wa 'A`nabin Tajri Min Tahtiha Al-'Anharu Lahu Fiha Min Kulli Ath-Thamarati Wa 'Asabahu Al-Kibaru Wa Lahu Dhurriyatun Äu`afa'u Fa'asabaha 'I`sarun Fihi Narun Fahtaraqat Kadhalika Yubayyinu Allahu Lakumu Al-'Ayati La`allakum Tatafakkaruna
